1b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Dal kan nA ma ma/
1b2(mdo sde): hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phag/ pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes
1b3(mdo sde): bye ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thegan pa chen po'i mdo/ / sangs
2a1(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
2a2(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu
2a3(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi
2a4(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa'
2b1(mdo sde): rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sgra dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
2b2(mdo sde): chen po mi pham pa dang / ngag mchog dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / dri med snying po dang / ye shes rgyal po dang / mtha' yas sde dang /
2b3(mdo sde): ye shes snang ba dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / shes rab snang ba dang / tshangs pas byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
2b4(mdo sde): po lha'i cod pan dang / de dag dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa sha stag
2b5(mdo sde): dang yang thabs cig go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu
3a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
3a2(mdo sde): khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan
3a3(mdo sde): shin tu yongs bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
3a4(mdo sde): shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthong dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
3a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la
3a6(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to/ / shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/
3b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya/
3b2(mdo sde): ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na
3b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po
3b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phegs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung lnga'i ba ma snyad 'das
3b5(mdo sde): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bral sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas pa snang ba'i dbang phyug
3b6(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung drug
3b7(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ / 'jig rten gyi khams bslu ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa med par rton pa'i
4a1(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
4a2(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ dan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po
4a3(mdo sde): cha'i pad+ma la rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi
4a4(mdo sde): khams gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i
4a5(mdo sde): pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa ri dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
4a6(mdo sde): brgyad po de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag ni yongs su dag pa ste/ bud med med do// snyigs ma lnga med do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
4a7(mdo sde): gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ len cing 'dzin la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ 'jug par byed cing
4b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul
4b2(mdo sde): lam/ lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de/ go skabs ma yin no// mi khom pa rnams su skye ba de'i gnas med do// shA ri'i bu bud med kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs
4b3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ blangs shing bzung la/ bklags shing kun chub par byas te/ 'jug par byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher
4b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ shA ri'i bu de bud med kyi dngos po lan gnyis len pa'i gnas de med cing go skabs ma yin te/ de'i gnas med do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
4b5(mdo sde): mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ blangs shing bzung la/ bklags
4b6(mdo sde): shing kun chub par byas te/ 'jug par byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang
4b7(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thag pa chen po la yang
5a1(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjod de/ nub mo srod la nyal na de
5a2(mdo sde): bde bar gnyid kyis ldog par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa can gyi rmi lAm rmi bar mi 'gyur de/ de gnyid kyis log pa na yang lha rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu
5a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjod nas
5a4(mdo sde): mtshan mo tho rangs 'jig rten pa'i bya ba rnams rtsom na/ 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag pa
5a5(mdo sde): zhugs pa gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ len cing 'dzin la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ 'jug
5a6(mdo sde): par byed cing / / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na// de 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi bar du nam yang mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang gzungs dang bral
5a7(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang mtshan dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang shes rab shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang sangs rgyas dang / byang
5b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi bar du nam yang shes rab phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar
5b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten mgon
5b3(mdo sde): po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa// de ni ngan 'gro kun bzlog nas// ring por mi thogs bde 'gror 'gro// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// de yi sems ni dang
5b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ / rtag tu 'jig rten mgon mthong nas// mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// de ni 'du ba'i sgo rnyed cing /
5b5(mdo sde): de ni rtag tu bkur bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// lha rnams kyis ni rtag tu mchod// myur du byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// mtshan rnams
5b6(mdo sde): 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ / de ni shes rab 'chal pa'am// blun pa'am 'on par yong mi 'gyur// kun tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// de la lha tA
5b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / / gsang ba lha dang lha min rnams// nyin dang mtshan du srung bar byed// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de ni gzugs mtshan phun sum tshogs// 'byor pa'i rigs sra/
6a1(mdo sde): skye 'gyur zhing // de ni sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pas// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang du// de yi kha nas dri 'byung ba// dri bsung zhim po
6a2(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur/ / thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// rdzu 'phrul che zhing yid gzhungs la// 'dab ma bye ba stong ldan pa'i// rin chen pad+mar skye bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//
6a3(mdo sde): pha dang ma dang rtsa lag dang // spun rnams kyi ni yid 'ong zhing // nam yang phongs pa mthong mi 'gyur// bud med kyis kyang bro ldan pa// de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos na// bud med lus la yid byung
6a4(mdo sde): nas/ / mkhas shing skyes par skye bar 'gyur// lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir// myur du byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi// rten dang skyabs su 'byung bar 'gyur//
6a5(mdo sde): de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs te// dug gis mi tshugs mes ma yin// g.yon can dag dang chom rkun dang // rgyal po'ang de la gnod mi byed// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// de la sdig dang
6a6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i bdud/ / nag po'i rtsa lag bzhon bcas pas// glags ni rnyed par yong mi 'gyur// zhing rnams bye ba bsam yas su// de ni mtha' las 'gro 'gyur te// phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing
6a7(mdo sde): der ni/ / 'jig rten mgon po rnams la lha// brtan pa sangs rgyas rnams mthong nas// dad pa brtan po thob par 'gyur// de yi bsam pa mkhyen nas su// mi mchog rnams ni lung ston to//
6b1(mdo sde): thub pa rnams las mngon sum bdag/ byang chub lung bstan thos nas su// rtag tu dga' dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de ni dogs pa med par 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig mtshan 'di dag
6b2(mdo sde): thos nas rab tu 'dzin byed pa/ / de ni yon tan 'di dag dang // rgya cher gzhan yang los kyang thob// thub pa drang srong che gyur pa// 'di dag rnams kyi mtshan thos nas// mi gang mtshan rnams
6b3(mdo sde): 'dzin byed pa/ / rdzu 'phrul cha mkhas bsod nams 'dod// de lta bas na bdag nyid che// de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos nas// skyes bu mkhas pas gzung bya zhing // gzhan dag la ni bshad par bya//
6b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
6b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
6b6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bi kri DI ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
6b7(mdo sde): bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
7a1(mdo sde): khyab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/ de'i
7a2(mdo sde): tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dngapal zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig
7a3(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ bu mo de yang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus lus kyi mdog gsar gyi kha dog lta bur mngon par grub par gyur cing / sa'i phyogs gang dag tu 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'gro ba'i
7a4(mdo sde): sa phyogs de dag kyang / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/ des gos dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ gang dag gyon par gyur pa'i gos de dag thams cad kyang / gser gyi
7a5(mdo sde): kha dog lta bu nyid du snang ngo / / bu mo de yang skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la dga' zhing yid gcugs pa dang / blta bas mi ngoms shing / bka' blo bde la nges pa dang / 'jam pa dang / snyan
7a6(mdo sde): pa dang / dga' bar smra zhing / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu 'thun par 'dzin pa dang // khro gnyer med pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang bar gyur pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po
7a7(mdo sde): den/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams dang / blon po'i bu gzhon nu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu gzhon nu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi bu gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / de la shin tu chags shing yid
7b1(mdo sde): 'brang bar gyur te/ blta bas chog mi shes so// smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de skyed mos tshal lam/ 'badab chu 'am/ rdzing bu 'am/ khyim mam/ lam po che'am/ grong bar ram
7b2(mdo sde): gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag tu/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po rnams kyang shin tu ltad mor gyur nas/ kun 'dus te de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gre'o// de nas smang
7b3(mdo sde): 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bas nor gyis glas te/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung nas// rta bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta dang / nor bu dang / mu
7b4(mdo sde): tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyis legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / me tog 'phreng
7b5(mdo sde): ba'i mdzes par byas pa/ me tog tsam pa ka'i 'phreng bas skar khung byas pa'i nang du snyan bzang po bshams pa la 'dug nas/ 'di ltar rtse zhing dga' ba'i bsam pas shing rta de'i mdun du ni
7b6(mdo sde): sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs len pa dag gis drangs/ shring rta de'i phyi bzhin du nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa thogs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang la/ skye bo'i tshogs
7b7(mdo sde): chen po ltad mo blta ba'i bsam pa can dag kyang / phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur cing / skyed mos tshal gyi sar dong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nang du yang dag 'jog las langs
8a1(mdo sde): te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyes nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ su zhig rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lam/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam// rjes su
8a2(mdo sde): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can gang thag pa chen po 'di la yongs su smin par bya snyam pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser
8a3(mdo sde): mchog 'od dpal tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang lhan cig tu shing rta la zhon te/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gdul ba'i phyir de'i dbang po dang / stobs dang /
8a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi bye brag la rnam par bltas na/ de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing / chos kun shes par bya ba'i nus pa dang / mthu dang / skal ba yod par rig nas/ de nas de'i tshe/
8a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas te/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dus byas pas/ 'di ltar rang gi lus bstan ma thug
8a6(mdo sde): tu/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang zil du rlag par byed na/ sems can gzhan dog gi lha smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bur rang gi lus rnam par sprul nas/ gos gang gi 'od kyis dpag tshad gcig/
8a7(mdo sde): tsam gyi khor yug snang ba/ snang bar byed pa'i gos de lta bu yang lus la gyon par kun tu bstan to// rang gi lus rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par yang bstan to// de nas 'jam dpal
8b1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas/ lus la gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan nas/ lam gang nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'ong ba'i lam de'i mdun logs su bsdad do//
8b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas der bsdad ma thag tu/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de'i shing rta yang mog mog por gyur/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyi lus thams cad kyang mog mog
8b3(mdo sde): por gyur to/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi drung du snag tsha'i yug bzhag na/ lham mer mi 'dug/ lhan ner mi 'dug/ lhang nger mi 'dug go// de bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur
8b4(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lus kyi 'od kyis reg pa na/ bu mo de'i lus kyang lham mer mi 'dug/ lhan ner mi 'dug/ lhang nger mi 'dug go// smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis/ 'jam dpal
8b5(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu gzhon nur ltar 'dug la/ lus la rgyan gyis brgyan cing / gsal ba'i gos legs par gyon la/ gos de las kyang 'od 'byung bar mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de bdag
8b6(mdo sde): gi lus la brnyas pa'i 'du shes dang / dman pa'i 'du shes skyes shing / gos de la yang mngon par 'dod pa dang / bzung ba'i 'du shes skyes nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshong
8b7(mdo sde): dpon gyi bu 'dis chog gis/ bdag shing rta 'di las babs la/ 'di dang lhan cig tu dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' dgur sprad la/ gos 'di yang bslang bar bya'o snyam mo// bu
9a1(mdo sde): mo des de lta bu'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bdag nyid mi'i gzugs su
9a2(mdo sde): mngon par sprul nas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod skyes bu dam pa 'di la kun tu chags pa'i sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin
9a3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ / bu mos smras pa/ 'di su zhig yin na/ 'di'i ming tsa/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya'o// bu mos
9a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ de ci lha 'am/ 'on te klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' ldang ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye
9a5(mdo sde): chen po 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ bu mo byang chub
9a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni/ lha yang ma yin/ klu yang ma yin/ gnod sbyin yang ma yin/ dri za yang ma yin/ lha ma yin yang ma yin/ nam mnga' lding yang ma yin/ mi 'am ci yang ma yin
9a7(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po yang ma yin/ brgya byin yang ma yin/ tshangs pa yang ma yin// 'jig rten skyong ba yang ma yin/ rgyal po chen po yang ma yin te/ bu mo de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun
9b1(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 'di ni bslangs pa thams cad sbyin par byed de/ yongs su mi gtong ba ci yang med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub
9b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ / de nas bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ de skad grags pa las na 'dis bdag la gos 'di sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od
9b3(mdo sde): dpal shing rta de las babs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gang khyod kyi sku la gsol ba'i na bza' 'di bdag la sbrul du gsol/ de'i tshe tshigs su
9b4(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ / gal te khyod ni byang chub la yang zhugs gyur na// 'jam dbyangs na bza' 'di ni bdag la stsal du gsol// ser sna can gyi byang chub sems dpa' mi mdzes te/ dper na
9b5(mdo sde): chab dang bral ba'i bskams pa'i klung dang mtshungs/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te bu mo khyod ni byang chub zhugs gyur na// kho bos de ring gos 'di khyod la sbyin par bya// gang dag g.yo ba
9b6(mdo sde): med par byang chub sems la gnas/ / de dag 'di ni lhar bcus 'jig rten mchod 'os yin// bu mos smras pa/ byang chub ces bgyi ba yi tshig gi don gang zhig lags// de ni gang las thob
9b7(mdo sde): cing su zhig sgrol bar bgyid/ / tshogs rnams gang dag la ni nges par bsten bgyis na// mkhas pa ma lags ma rtogs rnams kyis rtogs par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo
10a1(mdo sde): brjod pa med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag las rnam par grol ba dang / spyod pa dang / mtshan ma dag dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs
10a2(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba ni byang chub ces bya'o// de skad ces smras nas/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// srid
10a3(mdo sde): mo khyod byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / ngas khyod la gos 'di sbyin no// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo khyod nyid byang
10a4(mdo sde): chub yin no/ / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ ji ltar bdag byang chub lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo de bzhin gshegs
10a5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs pa de/ 'di skad du 'di ltar lus mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis lus
10a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid do zhes chos ston te/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems// khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mngon par grub
10a7(mdo sde): pa yod dam/ de nas bu mo des bstan pa 'di thos nas/ de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pas/ chos la snang ba skyes par gyur te/ des snang ba thob nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
10b1(mdo sde): dpal de ni de lta lags te/ bdag gi lus 'di la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag mngon par grub pa ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems// gzugs la sems
10b2(mdo sde): pa'am/ rnam par shes pa yod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang mi sems shing / rnam par shes pa med de/ sring mo
10b3(mdo sde): de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/ / byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras
10b4(mdo sde): so/ / sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sems pa'am/ rnam par shes pa yod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de
10b5(mdo sde): ni ma mchis so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang mi sems shing // rnam par shes pa med de/ sring mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// /
10b6(mdo sde): byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang gzugs nang ngam/ phyi rol lam
10b7(mdo sde): gnyis ka med par ram/ gzugs 'di sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ le brgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na
11a1(mdo sde): gnas pa zhes bstan par nus sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis
11a2(mdo sde): ka med par ram/ byang chub de sngon po 'amA/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po'am/ le brgan nam/ shal dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa 'am// phyogs na gnas pa
11a3(mdo sde): zhes bstan par mi nus te/ sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du
11a4(mdo sde): khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ / sring mo de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang ga 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka med par ram/ rnam par
11a5(mdo sde): shes pa 'di sngon po'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ lA brgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par nus
11a6(mdo sde): sam bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka med par ram/ byang chub de sngon po 'am
11a7(mdo sde): ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ le brgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/ sring
11b1(mdo sde): mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/ / byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod
11b2(mdo sde): nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ / sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log las skyes shing / yod pa ma yin pa// phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa'o//
11b3(mdo sde): sring mo byang chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis
11b4(mdo sde): sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid do/ / sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes
11b5(mdo sde): smras so/ / sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin yin pas/ shin tu mngon par mgrub pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir rmi lam
11b6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do/ / phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis rmi lam mnyam pa nyid do// rmi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rmi lam mnyam pa
11b7(mdo sde): nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul pa'i las kyis bskyed pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang
12a1(mdo sde): smig rgyu'i rang bzhin te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis smig rgyu
12a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid do/ / smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid de// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub po zhes//
12a3(mdo sde): smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ 'pho ba med pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin te/ 'pho ba med pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir gzugs brnyan
12a4(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do/ / phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs
12a5(mdo sde): brnyan mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni ming tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang ming
12a6(mdo sde): tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'o// g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// dung po mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid do// g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub
12a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid do/ / byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la byed pa po med de/ ma byas
12b1(mdo sde): pa'i don ni byang chub bo/ / phung po rnams la ngo bo nyid med de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la byung ba med de/ ma byung ba'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la rtag pa nyid med de/ mi rtag pa'i
12b2(mdo sde): don ni byang chub bo/ / phung po rnams la bde ba nyid med de/ sdug bsngal ba'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la sdug pa med de/ mi sdug pa'i don ni byang chub ngo // phung po rnams la bdag med de/ bdag med pa'i
12b3(mdo sde): don ni byang chub bo/ / sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la mngon par grub pa med de/ mngon par ma grub pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams ni dben pa ste/ dben pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la/
12b4(mdo sde): gzung ba med do// gzung ba med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la gzhi med de/ gzhi med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med de/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i
12b5(mdo sde): don ni byang chub bo/ / phung po rnams ni da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa ste/ da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa'i don ni byang chub bo// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams ni 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad yin pas/
12b6(mdo sde): byang chub kyang 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad do// phung po rnams ni tha snyad med pa'i rang bzhin can te/ byang chub kyang tha snyad med pa'o// phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs
12b7(mdo sde): su chud pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/ de ni byang chub ces bya'o// sring mo de ltar na phung po lnga'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te// sring mo
13a1(mdo sde): phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang
13a2(mdo sde): chub bo zhes smras so/ / sring mo gzhan yang phung po rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin te/ phung po ma gtogs par yang rtogs pa yang med la/ byang chub la gtogs par yang rtogs pa med pas
13a3(mdo sde): de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo rnam grangs 'dis na 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ji ltar sems can
13a4(mdo sde): thams cad byang chub tu gtogs pa ltar/ de gtogs pa med par bstan pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyis lus
13a5(mdo sde): 'di la/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / khams bzhi po de dag mngon par grub pa de la/ sring mo sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin
13a6(mdo sde): srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// de bzhin du chu'i khams
13a7(mdo sde): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang bdag ma yin// sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/
13b1(mdo sde): srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// shin tu nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir sa'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu med pa'i phyir chu'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu
13b2(mdo sde): mi g.yo ba'i phyir me'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo/ / shin tu bstan du med pa'i phyir rlung gi khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// sring mo sa'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni// de bzhin gshegs pas
13b3(mdo sde): mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo chu'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo ma'i khams
13b4(mdo sde): gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo rlung gi khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon
13b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par thugs su chud do/ / sring mo sa'i khams rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rtogs pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir
13b6(mdo sde): ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ / sring mo sa'i khams kyis chu'i khams yang dag par mi shes so// chu'i khams kyis me'i khams yang dag par mi shes so// me'i khams kyis
13b7(mdo sde): rlung gi khams yang dag par mi shes so/ / sring mo de ltar na khams kyi ming yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras
14a1(mdo sde): so/ / sring mo gzhan yang gang khyod kyi lus 'di la mig mngon par grub pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang // srid mngon par grub pa de la/ srid
14a2(mdo sde): mo mig ni stong pa ste/ mig stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// rna ba ni stong pa ste// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sna ni stong pa ste/ sna stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// lce
14a3(mdo sde): ni stong pa ste/ / lce stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// lus ni stong pa ste/ lus stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// yid ni stong pa ste/ yid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sring mo
14a4(mdo sde): de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ / sring mo gzhan yang mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs su 'dogs par mi byed de/ gzugs stong pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni
14a5(mdo sde): byang chub bo/ / rna ba dang / sna dang / lde dang / lus dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos su 'dogs par mi byed de/ chos stong pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du
14a6(mdo sde): khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/ / sring mo mig gzugs mi len te/ byang chub kyang gzugs mi len to// rna ba ni sgra mi len te/ byang chub kyang sgra mi len to// sna ni dri mi len te/ byang chub kyang dri mi len to//
14a7(mdo sde): lce ni ro mi len te/ byang chub kyang ro mi len to// lus ni reg bya mi len te/ byang chub kyang reg bya mi len to// yid ni chos mi len te/ byang chub kyang chos mi len to// sring mo de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig
14b1(mdo sde): gzugs dang bral ba ni byang chub bo/ / yid chos dang bral ba'i bar du yang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang mtshams
14b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba med de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// rna nga'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ sgra'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ na
14b3(mdo sde): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sgra'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ dri'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
14b4(mdo sde): khams dang / dri'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ ro'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ro'i khams
14b5(mdo sde): su bral ba ni byang chub bo/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ reg bya'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / reg pa'i khams su
14b6(mdo sde): dral ba ni byang chub bo/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi khams su bral ba
14b7(mdo sde): ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo de ltar na byang chub dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su
15a1(mdo sde): dbyer med do/ / byang chub dang / gzugs kyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// byang chub dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med
15a2(mdo sde): de gnyis su dbyer med do/ / byang chub dang / yid kyi khams kyi bar du de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyar med do// byang chub dang / chos kyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyar med do//
15a3(mdo sde): byang chub dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan
15a4(mdo sde): yang mig mi rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/ / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// mig gi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo//
15a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo// sring mo mig gi rang bzhin ni ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags
15a6(mdo sde): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba
15a7(mdo sde): ni byang chub bo/ / sring mo mig ni bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa// yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// de bzhin du rna
15b1(mdo sde): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa// bdag gi med pa// yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o//
15b2(mdo sde): sring mo mig ni skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang
15b3(mdo sde): ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yan/
15b4(mdo sde): bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no//
15b5(mdo sde): sring mo de bzhin du mig ni skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo yid kyi bar du yang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud
15b6(mdo sde): med kyang ma yin no/ / sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/ dud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo da ltar mig gi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang
15b7(mdo sde): chu bo/ / yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du yang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//
16a1(mdo sde): sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di ni bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ shred las skyes pa ma yin/ shed bu ma yin/
16a2(mdo sde): byed pa po ma yin/ tshor ba po ma yin/ shes pa po ma yin/ mthong ba po ma yin/ nyan pa po ma yin/ snom pa po ma yin/ za ba po ma yin/ reg pa po ma yin// rnam par shes pa po ma yin no//
16a3(mdo sde): sring mo byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin/ byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba
16a4(mdo sde): ma yin/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra ma yin/ dri ma yin/ ro ma yin/ reg bya rnam par rig pa ma yin te/ sring mo de lta bas na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub ces bya'o// sring mo gang
16a5(mdo sde): yang khyod kyi lus ni g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtag pa med pa ste/ rtswa dang / shing dang / shing ljon pa dang / rtsig pa'i tshogs rnams dang khyad par med cing / tha dad du dbyer med do// sring
16a6(mdo sde): mo gang yang nang gi sa'i khams dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gnyis su med cing / gnyis su dbyer med cing / gnyis su dbyer med de/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig par/
16a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang / ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang
16b1(mdo sde): sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa de ni sgra la gnas pa ma yin
16b2(mdo sde): sprul gnas pa ma yin/ sha mdog la gnas pa ma yin/ pags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ sha la gnas pa ma yin/ khrag la gnas pa ma yin// rus pa la gnas pa ma yin pa chub la gnas pa
16b3(mdo sde): ma yin/ rkang la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi rol la gnas pa ma yin// gnyis ka med pa la gnas pa ma yin// mig la gnas pa ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sna
16b4(mdo sde): la gnas pa ma yin/ / lce la gnas pa ma yin/ lus la gnas pa ma yin/ yid la gnas pa ma yin te/ gnas pa ma yin/ mi gnas pa ma yin/ rgyun chad pa ma yin/ yul na gnas pa ma yin/
16b5(mdo sde): phyogs na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa// rnam par rig pa med pa// gzung ba med pa/ 'dre ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ba/ 'od gsal ba ste/
16b6(mdo sde): sems dang yid kyi rnam par rig pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing / 'od gsal la/ lus med pa'i phyir/ kun nas
16b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med cing / rnam par dag pa med do// sring mo de ltar na phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung po dang / khams dang
17a1(mdo sde): skye mched rnams so/ / sring mo khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang dag mngon par grub pa de dag ni byang chub ste/ byang chub gzhan ma yin no//
17a2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams las gzhan ma yin te/ de bdag nyid byang chub yin pas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni/ byang chub yin pa'i
17a3(mdo sde): phyir ro/ / sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga
17a4(mdo sde): 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / gang dag smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u
17a5(mdo sde): dang / bu mo rnams las srog chags nyis brgyas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha dang mi drug cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag
17a6(mdo sde): go/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal yang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
17a7(mdo sde): gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas/ tshangs par spyad pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na
17b1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag kyang / khyod kyi rjes su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang
17b2(mdo sde): snying rjes sas rgyas kyi gdung mi gcod pa dang / chos kyi gdung mi gcod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung mi gcod pa'i slad du/ khyod kyis bstan pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
17b3(mdo sde): bskyed par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du chos rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad la chos bstan par yang bgyi'o// nyes par bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du gnongs
17b4(mdo sde): pa la nongs par bshags par bgyi'o/ / gang na chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar ma rtogs nas/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyin ci log gi dbang du mchis
17b5(mdo sde): pa dang / rang gi lus la mngon par zhen pas/ 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni/ chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ma rtogs so// 'jam dpal de lha lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang
17b6(mdo sde): gang dag 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ci 'dra ba de nyid dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ldan pa'i chos 'di la slob cing /
17b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni// ji ltar mchis pa ma lags pa la/ kun brtags pa las 'byung bar de ltar
18a1(mdo sde): kun brtags pa yongs su rtogs na/ 'gag par 'gyur bas gsog dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na
18a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni rang bzhin ma mchis shing byung ba ma mchis pas sprin gyi tshogs dang 'dra'o/ / nyon mongs pa rnams ni skad cig la 'jig cing 'jug ste// chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa
18a3(mdo sde): rnams ni shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa ste rlung dang 'dra'o/ / nyon mongs pa rnams ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das te/ nam mkha'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ring du
18a4(mdo sde): mi gnas pas chu'i ri mo dang 'dra'o/ / nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i 'jug pa las 'byung ba ste gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ma
18a5(mdo sde): mchis pa la phyin ci log tu mthong ba las 'byung ba ste/ sprin mAr dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni kun brtags pa las byung ba ste/ yang dag par ma legs pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ngar 'dzin
18a6(mdo sde): pas lhag par chags pa dang 'brel ba'o/ / nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag gir 'dzin pas/ dngos por yongs su 'dzin pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni log pas bskyed pas glo bur du byung ba'o//
18a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa las byung bas/ mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams sna tshogs la mi dpyod pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ste/ so sor mi rtog
18b1(mdo sde): pa'o/ / nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems dang rjes su 'thun par bskyed pa ste/ nges par mi sems pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan la mngon par zhen pa las byung ba ste/ yid
18b2(mdo sde): ches par mi bgyi ba'o/ / nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po dag len pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams rnams la ril por 'dzin pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni skye mched rnams sogs pa'o//
18b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni ming dang gzugs la rnam par 'byed pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa dag mi rtogs pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta lags
18b4(mdo sde): mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyon mongs pa rnams ni// byang chub kyi phur bu'i gzhi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang
18b5(mdo sde): chub kyi sa bon te/ nyon mongs pa rtogs pa nyid byang chub lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub rdo rje'i gzhi lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ byang
18b6(mdo sde): chub ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i slad du'o/ / 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams mthong ba ni byang chub ste/ byang chub ni yul thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub rnam par
18b7(mdo sde): gnas pa ma mchis pa de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ skyes nas 'jig cing 'dzu bas mi gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems kyi rang bzhin lags so// /
19a1(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal sems 'di ni/ chags pa'am/ snang ba 'am/ rmongs pa zhes/ sems kyi rang bzhin bstan par mi nus te/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
19a2(mdo sde): sems bstan par mi nus pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang / yul na gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin bstan par mi nus pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpa'
19a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de lta de ltar/ de 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar
19a4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ / zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la ma lags/ gti mug la spyod pa rnams la ma lags te/ cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jam
19a5(mdo sde): dpal da ltar bdag gi 'dod chags ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'dod chags la spyod pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi zhe sdang ji lta ba bzhin du// zhe sdang la
19a6(mdo sde): spyod pa thams cad kyi zhe sdang la blta bar bgyi'o/ / 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi gti mug ji lta ba de bzhin du/ gti mug la spyod pa thams cad kyi gti mug la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de ltar
19a7(mdo sde): bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni rtswa
19b1(mdo sde): dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi me yang nyon mongs pa'i rtswa dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so//
19b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ mun pa mun nag thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad
19b3(mdo sde): dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung dmar ni shing ljon pa dang / ri thams cad la mi chags so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang
19b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa'i yul thams cad la mi chags so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro//
19b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa'i sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na
19b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' ni rdul dang / na bun dang / sprin thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang
19b7(mdo sde): lhan cig mi gnas so/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni sa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon
20a1(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na khab long ni lpags dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags/
20a2(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri khor yug ni rlung thams cad kyis bskyod par mi
20a3(mdo sde): nus so/ / 'jam dngapal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ dud
20a4(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba/ byangang pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ 'o ma dang chob bsres pa las/ 'o ma nyid ni 'tshal gyi/ chub ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang
20a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang / 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / nyon mongs pa dang 'dres pa dag las shes rab nyid ni len gyi/ nyon mongs pa ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ byang gi sgra rma
20a6(mdo sde): sbyin gyi gring na/ nye dur 'brel pa'i bud med rnams la/ shing gi yul glu 'dud par mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can rnams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
20a7(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / bdags pa'i gapa ba dang ye shes 'dud par ming byed do// 'jam dpa ya ba dag ni gar nan mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa'am/ drug pa ci yang ma mchis so// 'obo'i gro z
20b1(mdo sde): he na/ 'jam dpal bdag gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben par rtogs pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos pa ste/ 'jam
20b2(mdo sde): dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dgras 'jigs pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa de yang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o//
20b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dgra bcom pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bcom pa de yang // byang chub sems dpa' zhes
20b4(mdo sde): mi bgyi'o/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chu ldang zhes bgyi ba rlab kyi nang du stsal na gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / chab kyi dri mas kyang mi gos la/ chab kyi rnyog ma thams cad
20b5(mdo sde): kyang rab tu dang bar bgyid do/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas kyang // nyon mongs pas gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing
20b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kyang mi gos la/ nyon mongs pa'i rnyog ma thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis bstan pa 'di bshad
20b7(mdo sde): nas/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dngapa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub sems
21a1(mdo sde): dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba'am/ 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad med pa zhes mi bya'o// sring po 'di lta ste dper na/
21a2(mdo sde): mar gyi sgron ma la mun pa mun nag snang na/ de 'bru mar gyi sgron ma zhes mi bya'o// sring mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa'
21a3(mdo sde): de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes mi bya'o/ / sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ su gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mi mthong / rnam par byang ba yang mi mthong ste/ mthong ba dang / mi mthong ba dang /
21a4(mdo sde): sems dang / yid dang / rnam par rig pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// sring mo gang dang gang du sems dang / yid dang / rnam par rig pa 'jug na/ tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems par
21a5(mdo sde): yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa med pa la ni sems sam/ sems la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir te/ gang gis dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'i dmigs pa la
21a6(mdo sde): sems 'jug pa de dag thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o/ / gang mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'khor ba'o// gang 'khor ba de ni 'du byed do// 'du byed thams cad ni 'khor ba ste/ sring mo de dag ni nyon mongs
21a7(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / sring mo nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni sbyor ba ste/ mig dang gzugs su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang /
21b1(mdo sde): reg bya dang / yid dang chos su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// tshul khrims la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang
21b2(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/ / rab tu dben pa la sbyor bar sems pa ni nyon mongs pa'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig sa
21b3(mdo sde): dgas so/ / de ni spros pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de ni rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de ni 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas te/ sring mo grangs dang
21b4(mdo sde): grangs med pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa nyid do/ / sring mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag la yang nyon mongs pa med la/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las kyang rab tu thar par bya ba la
21b5(mdo sde): yang shin tu brtson pa de ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag
21b6(mdo sde): phul lo/ / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub semasad pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul gang lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ stong pa nyid la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug
21b7(mdo sde): cing lta ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mtshan ma med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / smon
22a1(mdo sde): pa med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / smon pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i
22a2(mdo sde): rjes su 'jug cing / mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / rga ba dang / shi bar
22a3(mdo sde): 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / skye ba dang / 'jig par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / nyan/
22a4(mdo sde): thos su nges pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su nges pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / rang sangs
22a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / sems can thams cad la yang snying rje ba ste/ sring mo 'di ni byang
22a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul lo/ / sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i rin po che chen po dag thogs te ldog par ni dka' 'o// sring mo de bzhin du stong
22a7(mdo sde): pa nyid la so sor rtogs par ni sla'i/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka' 'o// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang /
22b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba med pa dang / nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa la yang so sor rtogs par ni sla'i/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka' 'o// sring mo 'di lta
22b2(mdo sde): ste dper na/ g.yul ngo chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i// ma smas pa ma nyams par rgyal bar ni dka' 'o// sring mo de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du 'jug par ni sla'i/ thabs la mkhas pa dang
22b3(mdo sde): bral bas ldog par ni dka' 'o/ / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal thabs zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo thabs zhes bya ba ni/ gang phyogs gnyis mi spong ba ste/
22b4(mdo sde): 'di ltar 'khor ba'i phyogs dang 7/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so// sring mo thabs zhes bya ba gang sgo gnyis ston par byed pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sgo dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dang 7/ stong pa nyid kyi
22b5(mdo sde): sgo dang / lta ba las rab tu thar pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma las rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / smon pa med pa'i sgo dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba'i sgo dang / mngon par 'du byed
22b6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i sgo dang / dge ba mngon du bya ba'i sgo dang / skye ba med pa'i sgo dang / skye ba kun tu ston pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgo dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi sgo dang / skye ba med cing //
22b7(mdo sde): 'gag pa med pa'i sgo dang / skye ba dang / 'byung ba'i sgo dang / bden pa'i sgo dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos thams cad so sor bsrung ba'i sgo dang
23a1(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo dang / rang byang chub kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mi brjed pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo byang chub sems
23a2(mdo sde): dpa' gang sgo gnyis nye bar ston kyang / sgo thams cad la yang chags pa med pa de ni thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi sgo dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang / zhe sdang gi sgo
23a3(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgo dang / gti mug gi sgo dang / gti mug dang bral ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgo ste/
23a4(mdo sde): sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / slob pa'i dang / mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem
23a5(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo gang yin pa de gnyis ka shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// // bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o//
23a6(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ngos kyi sman ldong zhig na/ zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang gcig tu ring du 'chags pas/ 'chag cing bzhugs
23a7(mdo sde): so/ der bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i skad bstan
23b1(mdo sde): pa de ni de bzhin te/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs kyis go bar gyur cing / legs so/
23b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i sgra de nyid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
23b3(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des bskul nas
23b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
23b5(mdo sde): sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lde ji dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis/
23b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad pa de/ bcom ldan 'das
23b7(mdo sde): kyis su la su la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'o// lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
24a1(mdo sde): pa de da lta ga na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i shar phyogs kyi sgo na
24a2(mdo sde): smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba dang lhan cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug gis/ lha'i bu dag gang dag chos nyan par 'dod pa dag kyang der deng zhig/ de nas lha dang /
24a3(mdo sde): dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
24a4(mdo sde): de dag thams cod lhan cig tu 'dus nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gal ba der song ste phyin pa dang / lus rags par sprul nas/ me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/ me tog gi char des rgyal po'i
24a5(mdo sde): khab kyi kho ra khor yug tu/ me tog gis char par bkram par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyis kyang mi rnams mthong zhing / mi rnams kyis kyang lha rnams mthong ste/ phan tshun smra bar mi byed do// de ltar
24a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag me tog dag gis kyang bskul/ lha'i lus rags pa de dag gis kyang bskul nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba
24a7(mdo sde): der dong ngo / / rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos/ 'jam dpal
24b1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas/ 'khor de dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / blon po dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gi bu rnams kyis/ smad 'tshong
24b2(mdo sde): ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de/ 'dod chags kyis nyon mongs par kun nas ldang ba dang bral te/ dbang po dang spyod lam rab tu zhi zhing / dbang po mi g.yeng la/ ngo tsha shes pa dang
24b3(mdo sde): dpal gyis legs par brgyan pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang de la phyin chad su yang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi skye bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po
24b4(mdo sde): de 'dus par rig nas/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis khyod mthong yang / phyir zhing chags pa med na/ khyod kyis
24b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa de dag gang du bzhag/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ye shes dang rnam par grol ba la gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa
24b6(mdo sde): de dag kyang ma bskyed pa dang / ma bkag pa dang / ma bsgyur bar de ltar bdag gis rtogs so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang lags pa de yang bdag gis rtogs lags so// 'jam dpal gyis
24b7(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal rtog pa ma mchis shing / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so//
25a1(mdo sde): tshul bzhin ma lags pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni glo bur te/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas
25a2(mdo sde): so/ / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i shes pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ dug drag po'i sprul
25a3(mdo sde): gdug pas bltas pa tsam gyis/ skye bo 'gum par 'gyur ba las/ der mi zhig gis dug thams cad 'jil ba dang / dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i sman gnod sel zhes bgyi ba 'tshal te mchis
25a4(mdo sde): nas/ de nas sma na de bstan ma thag tu sbrul gdug pa'i dug de ma mchis par bgyis nas/ de la khye'u dang bu mo rnams rtse bas rtse zhing / khye'u dang bu mo de dag sbrul gdug pa de dang lhan cig tu rtse bar bgyid de/
25a5(mdo sde): pang par len cing glo la se ral 'phreng du btags te/ rgyan du bgyis kyang tshig par mi bgyid/ za bar mi bgyid/ sdug bsngal du mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bdag kyang sngon chos 'dul
25a6(mdo sde): ba ma thos pa na/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa phyin ci log la nye bar gnas pa'i nyon mongs pas yongs su bsregs pa na/ 'dod chags kyi rang gi lus la chags shing / rang gi
25a7(mdo sde): gzugs la mngon par zhen te/ gzugs dbu ba lta bur so sor rtog par mi bgyid/ lus sgyu ma'i chos nyid du ma 'tshal/ dga' ba'i rtsed mo rmi lam lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i ro myang ba spang
25b1(mdo sde): rtsi'i thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/ srog gi dbang po zil pa'i thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par ma 'tshal/ lus mi sdug par ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad shin tu
25b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bar ma 'tshal cing / chos thams cad bdag ma mchis par so sor rtog par mi bgyid de/ bdag kyang mun pa mun nag gis ba sgribs shing / gzhan la yang mun par bgyid/ bdag kyang bcig
25b3(mdo sde): shing gzhan la yang bcing bar bgyid pa las/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe/ bdag gis khyod las chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid thos te/ thos nas kyang mos shing / mos nas kyang rnam par grol te/
25b4(mdo sde): de'i slad du bdag da ltar dang / slan chad chags pa'i mig gis su la yang blta bar mi bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal snang ba ni mun pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du
25b5(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba ni su yang nyon mongs pa rnams la chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces
25b6(mdo sde): smras so/ / kye ma 'jam dpal lha'i 'khor dang / mi'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus kyis/ gang gis lha dang mi 'di dag gis nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de dag rtogs nas/ sems can rnams la
25b7(mdo sde): snying rje bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi bka' mchid bgyi bar khyod spobs pa mdzod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo nyon mongs
26a1(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin la ni mos par dka'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni/ byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ma sbar ba ni sreg pa'i
26a2(mdo sde): bdag nyid ma yin no/ / sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su ma brtags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me sbar na ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mode
26a3(mdo sde): bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su brtags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni rgyu yod na 'bar ro// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang
26a4(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu yod na/ khams gsum du 'bar ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni rgyu med na mi 'bar ro// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu med na/ khams gsum du
26a5(mdo sde): mi 'bar ro/ / sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ lo stong du 'bar ba'i me la ni skye ba dang 'bri ba med do// sring mo de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong du rgyu ba'i nyon mongs pa la yang skye ba dang 'brib medo// sring mo 'di lta ste dper
26a6(mdo sde): me shi ba la ni ma zhes mi gdags so/ / sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs par shes par zhi ba la yang / nyon mongs pa zhes mi gdags so// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' gang la me 'bar yang // nam
26a7(mdo sde): mkha' ni me des tshig par mi nus so/ / sring mo de bzhin du gang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa 'byung yang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa de/
26b1(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs par byed mi nus so// sring mo 'di ltar yang gzugs kyi lus la ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mtsho bran gyi chab kyi nang gi chu zla bzhin du'o// 'jam dpa'
26b2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ bu mo phung po rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khams rnam
26b3(mdo sde): ji ltar blta bar bya/ / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ khams gsum bskal pa'i mes bsreg par gyur pa de bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo skye mched rnams ji ltar blta
26b4(mdo sde): bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i las mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/
26b5(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ 'khor 'di ni steng gi nam mkha'i mtshams bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod nyid ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal
26b6(mdo sde): dper na/ bdag pha dang ma gnyis phrad pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mong ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ long ba gzugs la ji lta ba bzhin du'o//
26b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis 'di dag thos sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pa'i rna ba'i rnam par rig pa lta bus thos lags so// 'jam dpal gyis
27a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag nyid byang chub lags te/ yang 'dod par mi
27a2(mdo sde): bgyid do/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad gtam du yongs su btang
27a3(mdo sde): bas sprad lags so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'
27a4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pas yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal
27a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pas bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtsams sam/
27a6(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thob par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis brtsams lagaso// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
27a7(mdo sde): gnas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi dbyings gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis bdag gnas lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shes
27b1(mdo sde): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag chad ma mchis par yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so// 'jam dpal gyis
27b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis byams pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad mi srid pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
27b3(mdo sde): bu mo byang chub sems pa'i snying rje chen po gang nas btsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las
27b4(mdo sde): btsal bar bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
27b5(mdo sde): skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i dga' bag las brtsal bar bya// bu mos smras pa/ lhag pa'i bsams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi
27b6(mdo sde): sems lags so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ci zhig byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ni/ sems can
27b7(mdo sde): thams cad mi bslu ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / chos thams cad la 'gal ba ma mchis pas nye bar mchi bar bgyid pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'gal ba zhes bgyi ba
28a1(mdo sde): ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag ma mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba'i slad du byang chub la rab tu zhugs pa dag go// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
28a2(mdo sde): dag gang dang 'gal/ bu mos smras pa/ phas kyis rgol ba thams cad dang ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo phas kyi rgol ba dag gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag bzod pa'i
28a3(mdo sde): rlom sems kyis gzhan la rgol ba dag lags so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba ga las 'ong / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyis mtho
28a4(mdo sde): btsam pa las mchi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtho ba tsam pa ma mchis na/ bzod pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'jam dpal gang la sems can gang gis mtho ba tsam pa na/ 'khrug
28a5(mdo sde): pa ma mchis shing / gnod pa mi bgyid pa de bzod pa bsgoms pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khong khro ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis
28a6(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la gnod par bgyid pa de ni khong khro ba zhes bgyi'o/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa
28a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gang gi sems la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis shing / yul thams cad la gnod pa mi bya ba ste/ de ni bzod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar
28b1(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang chos thams cad la rnam par 'byed kyang mi dmigs pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis spras
28b2(mdo sde): pa bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid kyang / nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na
28b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni phung po rnams ston kyang / phung po'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa rnams ston
28b4(mdo sde): kyang / rang bzhin chos nyid kyis chags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du rga ba dang 'chi ba ston kyang / chos thams
28b5(mdo sde): cad la 'chi 'pho dang / 'gro ba ma mchis par rab tu rtogs pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni lha'i bu dag ston kyang / phrag dog dang / rlom sems can thams cad dang bral ba'i slad
28b6(mdo sde): du'o/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas shes rab dang / thabs
28b7(mdo sde): yongs su bsgoms pas sems can yongs su smin par bgyid do/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpas ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bya/ bu mos smras
29a1(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal rang gi sems dang shes pa yongs su bsgoms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis
29a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ni khyod la chos nyan par 'dod do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang du bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes 'jug pa de ni/ nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags la/ gang
29a3(mdo sde): la rna ba'i rnam par rig pas rnam par shes pa 'jug na yang / nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos nyan par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos
29a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi lus la rmi lam gyi mi lta bur mos pa dang / ston pa'i chos de la yang brag cha'i sgra skad lta bur mos shing mos pa dang / rnam par grol ba yang gnyis su
29a5(mdo sde): mi bgyid pa de tsam gyis na/ chos nyan par 'tshal ba lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos ji ltar mnyan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ chos la rton pa nan tan bgyid na
29a6(mdo sde): chos mnyan par bgyi'o/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i shes rab kyis smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog
29a7(mdo sde): 'od dpal gyis de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i
29b1(mdo sde): theg pa pa sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i lha dang mi lnga brgya nI/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing
29b2(mdo sde): ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / bu mo de yang chos nyan pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas/ chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// nges bzod pa thob nas/
29b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ 'jam dpal thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag rab tu 'byung du gsol/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa kun bskyed pa/ 'phags pa
29b4(mdo sde): ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i chos las nyams par bgyid pa'i lus 'di lus 'di las thar par mdzad du gsol zhes rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo// 'jam dpal gyis smras
29b5(mdo sde): pa/ sring mo 'di lta ste/ mgo'i sgra 'dreg pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bu mo gang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gcod
29b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir brtson pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// bu mo gang gos ngur smig 'chang ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bu mo
29b7(mdo sde): gang bdag nyid kyang bslab pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / brtul zhugs la yang dag
30a1(mdo sde): par sbyor bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo gang bdag nyid dben par gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma
30a2(mdo sde): yin gyi/ bu mo gang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na rnam par rgyug pa'i sems can rnams dben par shes pa la 'god par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'o// kha dog
30a3(mdo sde): dang / gzugs kyi rtags dang / spyod lam gyi dbyings ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dag la byams pa dang /
30a4(mdo sde): snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can
30a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni/ byang chub sems
30a6(mdo sde): dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi nyon mongs
