203a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni nam kyang de bzhin nyid ma lags par mi 'gyur te/ des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags
203a7(mdo sde): pade ni res 'ga' de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ma lags la/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de yang res 'ga' de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ma lags kyi/ rtag tu de bzhin nyid de kho na lags so// des na
203b1(mdo sde): bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o/ / bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang
203b2(mdo sde): lags pa de ni/ yang dag pa ji lta ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid de/ des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces
203b3(mdo sde): smras so/ / che zhe ci khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gi sems shes sam/ 'on te rang gi shes pas shes// smras pa// btsun pa rab 'byor nyan thos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams sam// byang
203b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gang yang rung ste/ sems can gzhan gyi sems shes pa de dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyis mthus gzhan gyi sems shes pa lags
203b5(mdo sde): so/ / da ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gzhan gyi sems mkhyen pa gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mkhyen pa lags so// btsun pa rab 'byor dper na zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / me dang
203b6(mdo sde): nor bu dang / mar me dang / skar ma la brten nas/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis gzugs rnams mthong ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma rig pa'i mun pa na 'jig rten gnas pa las/
203b7(mdo sde): gang su ngadag pha rol gyi sems shes pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nas shes pa lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so//
204a1(mdo sde): che zhe khyod 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan pa khyod su yin pa dang / ga las 'ongs pa bdag la ston cig/ bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang zhig de bzhin gshegs
204a2(mdo sde): pa'i sprul pa la 'dri ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod su yin pa dang / ga las 'ongs pa bdag la ston cig ces de skad smras na/ ji skad du lan 'debs par 'gyur/ smras pa/
204a3(mdo sde): che zhe cung zad kyang lan gdab tu med do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes na/ bdag gis ci zhig shes su mchis// gzhan
204a4(mdo sde): yang gang zhig btsun pa rab 'byor la 'dri ste/ ci khyod so so'i skye bo yin nam/ 'on te slob pa 'am/ dgra bcom pa yin zhes de skad smras na lan ji skad gdab/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
204a5(mdo sde): sems pa la zhugs te/ che zhe 'di'i lan ji ltar gdab par bya snyam mo// de nas bar snang las btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis cung zad ci thob pa 'am/ rtog pa 'am/ mngon sum du byas pa'am
204a6(mdo sde): mngon par rtogs pa gang gis dgra bcom pa yin par shes pa de/ / che zhe 'di la ston cig ces sgra byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bar snang de las sgra byung ba de thos nas/ bud med de la 'di skad
204a7(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / che zhe bdag ni so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/ slob pa yang ma yin/ dgra bcom pa yang ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ smras pa/
204b1(mdo sde): che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i bdags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag la zung zhig/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams
204b2(mdo sde): kyi mchog dang / yon gnas zhes bgyi ba lags so// smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang yon
204b3(mdo sde): gnas ma yin no/ / smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na shes bzhin gyi brdzun gsung bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ che zhe gal te bdag zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med par
204b4(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang yon gnas yin par 'dzin par gyur na ni/ de ltar na bdag brdzun du smra bar 'gyur na/ gang gi phyir bdag de ltar mi 'dzin pa de'i phyir/ bdag ni yang dag par smra ba
204b5(mdo sde): yin gyi/ brdzun du smra ba zhes mi bya'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor sgo khang 'dir lha bden pa mthong ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'dus pa rnams la slu bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa
204b6(mdo sde): che zhe bden pa mthong ba de dag ni bslu bar mi nus so/ / smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis bden pa rnams gzigs sam// smras pa// mthong ngo // smras pa/ gal te bden pa rnams mthong du rung
204b7(mdo sde): na ni/ de dag bden pa ma lags par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bden pa rnams ni sus kyang mthong bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ che zhe bden pa mthong ba zhes bya
205a1(mdo sde): bde gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bden pa mthong ba zhes bgyi ba de ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par mthong ba'i tshig bla dgas so//
205a2(mdo sde): bden pa mthong ba zhes bgyi ba de ni/ phyin ci log yang dag par mthong ba'i tshig bla dgas so// smras pa/ che zhe khyod kyis gang las bsams te de skad smras/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
205a3(mdo sde): phyin ci log las nyon mongs pa kun nas bslang ba gang lags pa de ni bden pa mthong bas skye bar 'gyur te/ des na phyin ci log yang dag par mthong bas bden pa mthong zhes bgyi'o// de nas sgo 'ang
205a4(mdo sde): der chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha 'dus pa de dag gis/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la rags pa'i lus bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis che zhe 'di'i spobs pa thos pa de ni//
205a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems can gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no// gang dag mos pa de dag ni gang las kyang rnam par
205a6(mdo sde): grol ba med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mos pa mang ba rnams ni gang nas kyang rnam par grol ba med do// mos pa mang ba la ni 'ching ba med pas na// de ni gang las kyang rnam par
205a7(mdo sde): grol ba med do/ / de nas bud med des yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms la rgyur mi bzhud dam/ bshos bcad de ci bgyi/
205b1(mdo sde): / smras pa/ che zhe bdag gi sras ni 'di nyid yin te/ chos mnyan pa 'di lta bus chog go// che zhe gang gi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi phyir yid mi bde ba skye ba de ni chos 'dod pa ma
205b2(mdo sde): no/ / gang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no// gang lus dang / srog dang / bsod snyoms 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no// gang
205b3(mdo sde): tha na legs so/ / zhes bya ba 'dod pa de yang chos 'dod pa ma yin no// smras pa/ che zhe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag chos 'dod pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang 'ad /
205b4(mdo sde): pa la mi sred pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang mig dang / gzugs mi 'dod pa dang / rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang // ro dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang / chos mi 'dod pa
205b5(mdo sde): de ni chos 'dod pa'o/ / gang chos ci la yang mi rten pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang 'dod
205b6(mdo sde): pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la dmigs pa mi 'dod pa de ni// chos 'dod pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/
205b7(mdo sde): bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe bzod par gyis shig/ bdag sgo khang 'di nas 'gro'o// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor dper na/ sa'i khams la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal
206a1(mdo sde): ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi semasas dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor chul brjod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du
206a2(mdo sde): gang gi sems chu dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/ / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ gang gis sems me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'
206a3(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/ / btsun pa rab 'byor gru dang / stegs dang / zam pa dang / lam po che la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi sems
206a4(mdo sde): gru dang / stegs dang / zam pa dang / lam po che dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor byis pa rnams la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi/ 'phags pa rnams la ni bzod pa
206a5(mdo sde): gsol mi 'tshal lo/ / btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag la gnod sems dang / khro ba dang / bag la nyal skye ba de la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi/ gang dag mi skye ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo//
206a6(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor dper na/ me 'bar ba ni zhi bar bgyi 'tshal gyi/ mi 'bar ba ni zhi bar bgyi mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag gi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi/
206a7(mdo sde): gang dag nyon mongs pa med pa de dag la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe khyod ci zhig 'dod na 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs smras
206b1(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang 'dod pa mchis pa de ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs nus so// gang dag ci yang mi 'dod pa de dag ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs pa mchis pa la ni
206b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa mchis la/ gang la dmigs pa mchis pa de la ni seng ge'i sgra ci yang ma mchis so// 'jig tshogs la lta ba mchis pa la ni 'dod pa mchis la/ gang la lta ba'i rnam pa mchis pa de la ni
206b3(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra ci yang ma mchis so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan ci zhig bzhed pas len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur/ smras pa/ che zhe 'dod pa yod pa la ni rnam par grol ba
206b4(mdo sde): ci yang med do/ / smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang bzhed pa len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba de bzhin du bdag kyang de lta bu'i 'jug pas zhugs so// bdag kyang de lta/
206b5(mdo sde): bu'i rnam par grol ba'i 'jug pas zhugs so// bdag kyang de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'jug pas zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so//
206b6(mdo sde): che zhe theg pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa rnams dang / rtags gang yin pa rnams dang / mtshan ma gang dag yin pa 'di lta bu dag bdag la ston pa las na/ khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag
206b7(mdo sde): par zhugs pa yin par the tsom med do/ / bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams mkhyen
207a1(mdo sde): ta ma smras pa/ che zhe nyan thos kyis ni ma thos par theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams shes par mi nus kyis/ che zhe theg
207a2(mdo sde): ba chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams shod cig/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni// chags pa ma mchis pa'i theg pa dang /
207a3(mdo sde): sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes dang / tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor dper na las su 'gro ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang // zla ba dang nyi ma'i gzhal med khang rnams
207a4(mdo sde): ni sems can rnams la snang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ / chags pa ma mchis pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par nam mkha' la shugs kyis mchi ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor
207a5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems can thams cad la chos kyi snang ba bgyi ba'i slad du/ chags pa ma mchis pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par pha
207a6(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi shugs kyis mchi'o/ / btsun pa rab 'byor dper na gling bzhi ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lags te/ de dag gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der gling bzhi pa'i mo rnams kyis bsten
207a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags la/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang sems can de dag la bsam pa mi mnyam pa'i rnam pa ma mchis te/ byams par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po
207b1(mdo sde): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang
207b2(mdo sde): der sems can thams cad kyis bsten pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags la/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms shing / tha dad du spyod pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsdu ba rnam pa
207b3(mdo sde): bzhis sdud pa na sems la byams pa tha dad pa ma mchis te/ des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni theg pa de che ba lags la/ lha dang / klu dang // gnod
207b4(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
207b5(mdo sde): rten skyong ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa rnams dang / shes pa rnams dang / yang dag par song ba rnams dang yang dag bar zhugs pa rnams
207b6(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa lags te/ des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// theg pa de ni ma skyes pa'i phyir mi zad pa'o// theg pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa'o// theg pa deni chos kyi rigs sdud pa'o// theg
207b7(mdo sde): pa de ni dge 'dun gyi rigs yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ / theg pa de ni sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing sgrib pa med pa'i yangs pa'o// theg pa de ni phan ma mchis pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'o// theg pa
208a1(mdo sde): de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis shin tu sbyang ba byas pa'o/ / theg pa de ni bsdu ba rnam bzhis legs par bsdus pa'o// theg pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba
208a2(mdo sde): phyir/ shin tu yang dag par song ba'o// theg pa de ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgoms pas/ bzhon pa bzang po dang ldan pa'o// theg pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / byang chub kyi sems ma brjed
208a3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir kha lo sgyur bzang po'i gnas so/ / theg pa de ni snying rje chen pos shin tu brtan pa'o// theg pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis legs par gnas pa'o// theg pa de ni bdud thams cad pham par
208a4(mdo sde): byas pas 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/ / theg pa de ni shes rab kyi snang ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir mun pa dang bral ba'o// theg pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sdud cing sogs pas shin tu 'byor pa'o//
208a5(mdo sde): theg pa de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bgyis pa'o// theg pa de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba'o// theg pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka'
208a6(mdo sde): ba'o/ / theg pa de ni mi dad pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni sdang ba rnams byams par bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni ser sna can rnams kyi gtong ba bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni tshul
208a7(mdo sde): khrims 'chal pa rnams kyi tshul khrims bgyid pa'o/ / theg pa de ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi bzod pa bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni le lo can rnam kyi brtson 'grus bgyid pa'o// theg pa
208b1(mdo sde): de ni brjed ngas pa rnams dran par bgyid pa'o/ / theg pa de ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams nye bar zhi bar bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyi shes rab bgyid pa'o// theg pa
208b2(mdo sde): de ni dbul po rnams kyi nor bgyid pa'o/ / theg pa de ni sdug bsngal ba rnams bde bar bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni mkhas pa rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni shes pa rnams dang bar
208b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa ste/ des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags
208b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams legs par smras sam/ bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams ni bskal pa
208b5(mdo sde): 'am/ de bas ches lhag par bdag gis bshad du lags kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po ji ltar tshad ma mchis pa de bzhin du rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams
208b6(mdo sde): dang / mtshan ma rnams kyang tshad ma mchis so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// che ne khyod kyis bdag la khyod ci zhig 'dod de bsod snyoms
208b7(mdo sde): bar byed cing glags btsal ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag nyid kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de'i glags btsal lam/ bud med des smras pa/
209a1(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thabs gang gis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad pa mkhyen pa lta na/ de spobs par mdzod cig/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa// chezhe
209a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thabs ji lta bu zhig gis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad/ bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig gzigs nas bsod snyoms la
209a3(mdo sde): rgyu ba mdzad de/ nyi shu rtsa gcig po gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi sku bzang po bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad de/ der sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
209a4(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mthong ba de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan thos par bgyi ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang
209a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de
209a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa grong dang / grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegs na/ sems can long ba rnams kyis ni gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ sems can 'on pa rnams kyis ni sgra thos par 'gyur/
209a7(mdo sde): sems can smyon pa rnams kyis ni dran pa rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can gcer bu rnams kyis ni gos rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can bkres pa rnams kyi ni zas rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can skom
209b1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis ni btung ba rnyed par 'gyur la/ sems can su la yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/ phrag dog gam/ ser sna dang / khro ba dang / rgyags
209b2(mdo sde): pa dang / 'chab pa dang / yongs su gdung ba'i gnod pa ma mchis so// sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang ldan te/ gcig la gcig pha ma'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te/ der
209b3(mdo sde): sems can mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang / grong khyer du gshegs pa'i yon tan phun sum chog pa de mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/
209b4(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong
209b5(mdo sde): rdal du gshegs na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yon dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang /
209b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams mchod pa'i las bgyi ba'i slad du phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ der sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi rnams kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
209b7(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa
210a1(mdo sde): mthong nas/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dod pa skye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngo mtshar che ba nas/ rmad du byung ba'i bar gyi chos dang ldan no snyam ste/ de dag gis
210a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas//
210a3(mdo sde): bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gsheg pa bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong na/ sems can dpag tu med pa longs spyod dang dbang phyug gis rgyags shing myos pa dang
210a4(mdo sde): gzugs dang / rigs dang / 'tsho ba dang / nad med pas rgyags shing myos pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor nas// rab tu byung zhing bsod snyoms la rgyu zhes
210a5(mdo sde): grag ste/ des kyang 'di ltar nga rgyal bcom na/ kye ma bdag cag gis kyang nga rgyal gzhom par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis de lta bu mthong nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem skyed par bgyid de/
210a6(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang / grong khyer du bsod snyoms la
210a7(mdo sde): rgyu ba na/ lha gzi byin che ba gzi byin che ba rnams kyis dgos pa la bltas nas 'di skad du 'di la ni bkres pa dang / skom pa'i gnod pa yang med la/ lus nyam chung ba yang med kyi/ sems can rnams la
210b1(mdo sde): snying brtse ba ched cher byas nas bsod snyoms la rgyu bar byed kyis/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying brtse ba ched cher bya ba'i sems kyis bsod snyoms la rgyu bar bya'o zhes smra zhing // de dag
210b2(mdo sde): gis de lta bu mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byer de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do//
210b3(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can le lo can snyoms las can de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mi mchi ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang /
210b4(mdo sde): grong khyer du gshegs na 'bad mi 'tshal bar mthong bar 'gyur la/ mthong bas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po 'thob par 'gyur te/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob
210b5(mdo sde): nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do//
210b6(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong na don yod pa ste/ tha na sems can gang dag gis sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam la zhi ba'i mig gis de bzhin gshegs
210b7(mdo sde): ba mthong na yang de 'ba' zhig gis kyang de dag thams cad kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas
211a1(mdo sde): bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/ / btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang / grong khyer du gshegs na/ sems can bcing bas bcings pa rnams bcing
211a2(mdo sde): pa las grol bar 'gyur la/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag cag bcing ba 'di dag las grol bar gyur to zhes thos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba dang / byas
211a3(mdo sde): pa tshor bar gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms
211a4(mdo sde): la rgyu ba mdzad do/ / btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa thos na kye ma ma la bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
211a5(mdo sde): la bsod snyoms dbul bar bya'o/ / chos gos dbul ba dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stir bya ba ci yang rung bas mchod par bya'o snyam du sems pa de lta bu dag mchis la/ de dag las
211a6(mdo sde): kyang mas bsrungs pa 'am/ phas bsrungs pa 'am/ ming pos bsrungs pa'am/ phu nu mos bsrungs pa 'am/ khyim thab kyis bsrungs pa 'am/ mdza' bos bsrungs pa rnams de
211a7(mdo sde): dang de'i rkyen gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du mchi mi nus te/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang / grong khyer du gshegs pa mthong na/ tshim zhing mgu la/ rab tu dga' zhing
211b1(mdo sde): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyid do// phul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/ btsu/
211b2(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
211b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis lhung bzed phul nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pa mchis te/ der sems can longs spyod chung ba dang / chung ngu sbyin par 'tshal ba gang dag lags pa de dag gis de bzhin
211b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i lhung bzed gang bar mthong ngo / / sems can longs spyod che zhing mang du sbyin par 'tshal ba gang dag lags pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung zed ma gang bar mthong nas// de dag
211b5(mdo sde): gis ji tsam dgos pa phul te/ lhung bzed gang bar bgyis nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid do// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don
211b6(mdo sde): gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ / bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi nang du/ bca' ba dang / bza' ba dang / myang bar bya ba ro brgya dang ldan
211b7(mdo sde): pa blugs na/ bca' ba dang / bza' ba dang / myang bar bya ba de dag 'dre bar mi 'gyur te/ ji ltar snod tha dad pa'i nang na mchis pa de kho na bzhin du mchis te/ der lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
212a1(mdo sde): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po sa yodag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ bla na

212a5(mdo sde): ngo mtshar du gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas// bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do//

212a7(mdo sde): khong ka yang mi mnga'/ phyis yang mi mnga'/ gcin yang mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang / bshos gsol ba de lta bur yang gda' la khong du med pa yang mi mnga'
212b1(mdo sde): ste/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa mang po dag gis de mthong nas

212b7(mdo sde): pa'i lha gzi byin che ba gzi byonas rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing / ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi g.yo ba mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni sems can gyi don la
213a1(mdo sde): brtson pa yin gyi/ zas 'dod pa ma yin par the tsom med do snyam nas/ de dag dga' ba thob nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed

213a3(mdo sde): rgyu ba mi mdzad de/ zhal zas kyang mi gsol bar gyur na ni de lta na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de dag kyang bas
213a4(mdo sde): mi za ba la zhugs te/ bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu bar mi bya/ zas kyang bza' bar mi bya'o snyam nas/ de dag bkres shing nyam chung bar gyur pas/ khyad par thob pa rtogs par mi nus te/
213a5(mdo sde): de dag gis ma 'ongs pa na khyad par 'thob pa'i bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing gsol bar mdzad de/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas

213b1(mdo sde): gal te 'di dag gi ston pa nyid kyis kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu ba ma byas na/ 'di dag ci'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu bar byed ces/ de dag dge slong dang / dge slong ma rnams la shas cher mi dga' bar

213b3(mdo sde): dag gis bsngags pa yang rjod par bgyid la/ bsod snyoms kyang ster bar 'gyur te/ 'di skad du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba 'di ni/ gtsug lag las 'byung ba'i bsod snyoms yin no// spyod pa

214b2(mdo sde): bstan par mi nus so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsod snyoms la rgyu ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ khyim bdag de'i nang mi de dag dang / khyim gzhan dag nas chos nyan du

215a7(mdo sde): chub la 'dzud par bgyid do/ / btsun pa rab 'byor sems can brgya byin gyi dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag la bdag brgya byin gyi dga' ba stobs par bgyid de/ bstabs nas kyang bla na med pa

216a4(mdo sde): rnams 'phags pa'i lam la bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos gang kho na yin pa de dag nyid kyis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni dka' bar byed pa ste ngo mtshar to/ / /
216a5(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa// / de nas bud med des dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par byas pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu gnyis

216a7(mdo sde): cing / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ 'bru mar gyi mar me chung ngu gang lags pa de kha'i dbugs sam/ lag pas g.yabs pa 'am/ gos kyis g.yabs pa'i rlung gis
216b1(mdo sde): zhi bar mdzad spyod dam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'bru mar gyi mar me chung ngu gang yin pa de ni kha'i dbugs sam/ lag pas g.yabs pa 'am/ gos kyis g.yabs pa'i rlung gis zhi bar byed nus so//
216b2(mdo sde): de gnyis kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'i shes rab kyis snang ba dang / bsod nams kyi snang ba chung ngu nga ni 'dod pa'i rtog pa gcig
216b3(mdo sde): gis kyang ma mchis par bgyid do/ / btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me'i phung po gang lags pa de/ gang+gA'i klung chus gang bas zhi bar mdzad spyod dam/ smras pa
216b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag de ni rgya mtsho 'bum gyis kyang zhi bar mi nus na/ gang+gA'i klung chus yongs su gang bas lta ci smos/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
216b5(mdo sde): chen po'i shes rab kyi snang ba dang / bsod nams kyi snang ba yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa gang pad+ma'i klung gi bye
216b6(mdo sde): ma snyed du 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang / de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi snang ba dang / bsod nams kyi snang ba zad par mi nus so// btsun pa rab
216b7(mdo sde): 'byor dper na mi dbul po nad pa gso zhing nad zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sman pas sman dang ra ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan tshwa'i ro dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska ba las mod pa dang / rin
217a1(mdo sde): @#/ chung ba lags pa de dag stsol bar bgyid do// des kyang bdag bde nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ de dag bsten par bgyid do// de dag bsten pas nang chung ba'i slad du nang
217a2(mdo sde): de las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin de/ btsun pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyi theg pa pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / 'dod pa nyung ba dang / dgon pa na gnas pa dang
217a3(mdo sde): chog shes pa dang / longs spyod chung ba dang / bya ba nyung bas sdug bsngal thams cad nyams su myong nas/ de'i 'og tu len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ btsun pa
217a4(mdo sde): rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bgyi te/ ji ltar mi dbul po gso ba de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rnam par grol ba yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o// btsun pa rab 'byor
217a5(mdo sde): dper na rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba nad pa gso ba'i phyir sman pas rgyal po la 'os pa'i sman kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa
217a6(mdo sde): pab dang / khar bcug na yang zhim la lhor song na yang bde ba de lta bu legs par sbyar nas sbyin par bgyid de/ rgyal po la 'os la'i khu bcud do bcog kyang de la sbyin par bgyid do//
217a7(mdo sde): rgyal po de yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa rnams de la 'bul bar bgyid do// sil snyan dang
217b1(mdo sde): pheg rdob pa rnams kyang de dang 'thun par sbyor zhing glu len par bgyid do/ / de ji tsam du dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag gis dga' bar gyur pa de tsam du nad de las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
217b2(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' kha cig dga' ba la bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas dga' ba thams cad kyang myong la/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i theg pas bla na med pa yang dag par
217b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu dag kyang mchis te/ btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar blta bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar rgyal
217b4(mdo sde): po gso ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mngon par rtogs pa yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang / rtsa ba ma mchis
217b5(mdo sde): ba dang / gnas ma mchis pa lags la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rtsa ba ma mchis pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa lags te/ de lta bur bzod pa gang lags pa des ni bdag gis bya/
217b6(mdo sde): ba ni gang yin/ mi bya ba ni gang yin snyam du rang gis 'tshal to// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mi dmigs pa lags te/ gang gis de lta bur bzod pa des ni lam ni gang yin/ lam ngan pa ni gang
217b7(mdo sde): snyam du rang gis 'tshal to/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang stong la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang spong ste/ gang gis de lta bur bzod pa de ni 'dod pa rnams las bzlog mi 'tshal te/ de ni rang nyid
218a1(mdo sde): kyis 'dod pa rnams la smod par bgyid do/ / ston par mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshong dpon sring gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// chen 'di
218a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyi cir 'ong / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de gnyis kyis/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'di ni pha lags ma
218a3(mdo sde): yang lags/ / 'di ni mdza' bo grogs mchog 'di// 'di ni khyo lags 'khras lags// 'di ni ston pa bla na med// 'di nyid kyi ni mthu stobs kyis// 'dis ni yongs su grol bar bgyis// 'dis ni de
218a4(mdo sde): bzhin nyid ldan pas/ / sdug bsngal 'ching las bdag cag bkrol// 'di ni chos kun ston pa ste// rigs pa kun gyi rnam par rtogs// bdag cag gnyis ni dga' byin nas// 'chi ba med la legs pa btsud
218a5(mdo sde): ji ltar nya ni shas g.yogs pa'i/ / mchil pa yis ni bzung ba ltar// 'dis ni thabs kyis bdag cag gnyis// bsod nams rgyas ni bcus par gyur// gdug pa'i sbrul gyis zin pa yin// dug ni
218a6(mdo sde): dug gis zhi bgyid ltar/ / de bzhin 'dis ni bdag cag gis// 'dod chags dug ni dug gis bcom// ji ltar mi ni mes tshig pa// me yis bsros na zhi ba ltar// de bzhin rang gi nyon mongs gdung //
218a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs rnams kyis yongs su bkrol// bdag cag gnyis kyis dam chos rtogs// 'dod pa bdag cag gnyis mi 'tshal// byis pa gang dag 'dod pa 'tshal// de dag byang chub 'dod ma lags/
218b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'dod par gsungs pa rnams// de dag 'jig chen gshed ma ste/ de dag nyid ni yongs rtog pa// mkhas pa rnams kyi nam grol lags// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud/
218b2(mdo sde): med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe khyod kyis rigs kyi bu rnams kho na dga' ba la bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa/ 'dis 'dul bar byed dam/ 'on te rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang 'dul bar byed/ smras/
218b3(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis ni dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can thams cad gang yang 'dul bar mi bgyid pa ma mchis te/ btsun pa rab 'byor bud med kyi sems ni lhag
218b4(mdo sde): par yang dga' ba la sred pas na/ bdag gis ni bud med ches mang du dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas btul gyis/ skyes pa dag ni de lta ma lags so// smras pa/ che zhe khyod kyis ji
218b5(mdo sde): ltar bud med kyi gzugs kyis bud med 'dul bar byed/ de nas bud med des de'i tshe/ skyes pa lo nyi shu rtsa gnyis lon pa/ gos btsang ma srab mo bgos pa/ skyes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
218b6(mdo sde): mdzes shing blta na sdug pa/ kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur snang bar byas nas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bud med ni gzugs kyi lus 'di lta bus 'dul bar 'gyur ro//
218b7(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// ci khyod bud med yin nam/ 'on te skyes pa yin// des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci khyod so so'i skye bo 'am
219a1(mdo sde): 'on te slob pa lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/ slob pa yang ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bdag kyang de bzhin te/ bung med
219a2(mdo sde): kyang ma lags/ skyes pa yang ma lags so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gal te khyod skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin na/ bdag gis khyod ji ltar gzung bar bya/ smras pa
219a3(mdo sde): gal te btsun pa so so'i skye bo yang ma lags/ slob pa yang ma lags na/ bdag gis khyod ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byang chub sems
219a4(mdo sde): dpa' 'di ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan te/ gal te bdag gis btsams na ni yang bdag la 'dri bar lo ngo snyam mo// de nas rigs kyi bu des/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems sems kyis brtags
219a5(mdo sde): nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor khyod ni brtan po ma lags te/ 'dri bas skrag gis/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'dri bas skrag par ma mdzad cig/
219a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor zag pa zad pa de dag gang lags/ ci 'das pa rnams lags sam/ ma 'ongs pa rnams lags sam
219a7(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba rnams la gas sa/ 'das pa gang lags pa de dag zad ces bgyir ni 'das pa la bad pa ma mchis so// ma 'ongs pa gang lags pa de dag kyang dadung ma phyin pa ste/ de dag kyang zad par
219b1(mdo sde): bgyir mi nus so/ / da ltar byung ba gang lags pa de dag ni mi gnas pa ste/ de dag kyang zad par bgyir mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni 'dri ba thams cad kyi lan
219b2(mdo sde): gdab par mi nus pa'i steng du/ bsod snyoms kyi dus la bab ste/ bdag gi dus yol du 'ong gis bsod snyoms la 'gro'o// de nas de'i tshe rigs kyi bu de byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
219b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ / rigs kyi bu de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs
219b4(mdo sde): med pa dag mthong ste/ la lar ni nyi ma 'char ka tsam/ la lar ni nyi ma bag dros tsam/ la lar ni dros bu chung tsam/ la lar ni snga dro byed tsam/ la lar ni dro la bab tu nye ba'i dus tsam/ la lar
219b5(mdo sde): ni 'gan de rdung ba'i dus tsam/ la lar ni snga ma bkod pa tsam/ la lar ni bkod zin pa tsam/ la lar ni zan za zhing 'dug pa tsam/ la lar ni ldang ba tsam la lar ni lhung bzed 'khru ba tsam/
219b6(mdo sde): la lar ni phyed yol gyi dus tsam/ la lar ni phye ma red kyi dus tsam/ la lar ni srod tsam/ la lar ni nam phyed tsam/ la lar ni nam chung khor tsam/ la lar ni zla ba dang nyi ma med de/ rang gi 'od
219b7(mdo sde): dang ldan par mthong ngo / / de nas rigs kyi bu des/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor khyod dus tshong gang gi tshe ba shos gsol/ dus chod ni ji tsam du gda'
220a1(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'di nyid kyi dus chod la zan za'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi dus chod la ma yin no// de nas rigs kyi bu des de'i
220a2(mdo sde): tshe nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nub phyogs su song ba de snga dro phyongad tsam du bzhag ste/ ci nas snga dro phyed tsam du 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas so// de nas rigs
220a3(mdo sde): kyi bu des/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor dus tshod ji tsam la bab pa gzigs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis mthong nas yid ches te mi
220a4(mdo sde): rings par gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi ming ci yin pa bdag la ston cig/ rigs kyi bu des smras pa
220a5(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor la bdag gi ming gis ci zhig bgyi/ yang na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la zhus shig dang / des khyod la lan 'debs so// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang ming thams cad ni ming
220a6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming thams cad ni kun brtags pa dang / yang dag pa ma lags te/ gang kun brtags pa dang / yang dag pa ma lags pa de la ming zhes ji skad bgyi
220a7(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ming gang yin pa de yang kun brtags pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni de bzhin
220b1(mdo sde): te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na ming phan tshun tha dad pa mchis pa'i slad du'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu thams
220b2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ming tha dad pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lar ni mthu zhes bgyi'o// la lar ni
220b3(mdo sde): sdud pa zhes bgyi'o/ / la lar ni thams cad du snang ba zhes gyi'o// la lar ni dri ma med pa zhes bgyi'o// la lar ni don thams cad ston pa zhes bgyi'o// la lar ni nyams pa med pa zhes
220b4(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / la lar ni mchod pa po zhes bgyi'o// la lar ni mngon sum pa zhes bgyi'o// la lar ni byi ru 'dzin ces bgyi'o// la lar ni rnam par rgyal ba chen po zhes bgyi'o// la lar ni sgra
220b5(mdo sde): chen po zhes bgyi'o/ / la lar ni dpag tu ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na ming tha dad pa dpag tu
220b6(mdo sde): ma mchis so/ / de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ming tha dad pa yang dpag tu ma mchis so// de bzhin du phung po rnams
220b7(mdo sde): dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang
221a1(mdo sde): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na/ ming tha dad pa dpag tu
221a2(mdo sde): ma mchis te/ de bas na btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang ming thams cad kyang ming ma mchis pa dang / kun brtags pa dang / yang dag pa ma lags pa de ltar rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
221a3(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams ni de na yon gnas 'di lta bu dag 'khod pa las na/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin
221a4(mdo sde): no/ / rigs kyi bu des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten na yon gnas gang lags pa mkhyen tam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar bdag gis spobs pa de bzhin du bstan pa bya ste/
221a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos la zhugs pa/ sems 'khrul pa med pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis ji skad
221a6(mdo sde): bstan pa de dag ni yon gnas yongs su rdzogs pa ma lags so/ / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yon gnas yong su rdzogs pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor sems can thams cad
221a7(mdo sde): la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yang skye la/ sems can gang yang mi dmigs pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so// sangs rgyas dang
221b1(mdo sde): chos dang / dge 'dun gyi tshul mi gcod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa sbyong ba la brtson pa gang dag lags pa de dag
221b2(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/ / ye shes mi zad pa dang / shes rab mi zad pa dang / bsod nams mi zad pa dang / spobs pa mi zad pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten
221b3(mdo sde): na yon gnas lags so so so'i skye bo'i grogs mi bgyid la/ 'phags pa'i grogs bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so// gang dag mthong ba tsam gyis
221b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis ye shes mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/ / de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi phyi bzhin du rtag tu 'brang ba'i lha
221b5(mdo sde): nges pa la ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des yon gnas kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la phyag
221b6(mdo sde): 'tshal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol te/ btsun pa rab 'byor bdag khyod kyi slad bzhin du 'brang bar mi bgyid do zhes byas so// de nas rigs kyi bu des/ lha de la
221b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha khyod ci'i phyir btsun pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol/ spras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du btsun pa rab 'byor gyi phyi bzhin du 'brangs kyang / bdag
222a1(mdo sde): gis yon gnas kyis bstan pa 'di lta bu sngan chad ma thos te/ de bas na ltar yon gnas kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag
222a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dang gang na yon gnas kyis yongs su dag par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sdud par byed pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag
222a3(mdo sde): thos par 'gyur ba de dang der 'gro'o snyam mo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha de'i sems bskyed pa de la rjes su yi rang nas lha de la 'di skad ces smras so// lha khyod kyis sems sangs rgyas
222a4(mdo sde): kyi chos rgya chen po dag la btud pa de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ / lha bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems snang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pas ci byar yang med
222a5(mdo sde): do/ / lha gal te bdag sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhig mod/ lha gzhan yang khyod kyis ni sngon ma thos pa'i
222a6(mdo sde): chos rnams thos par byed pa dang / thos pa rnams kyang chud mi za bar byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'di ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsten par bya'o// de nas rigs kyi
222a7(mdo sde): bu des/ lha de la 'di skad ces smras so// lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'grub par dka' ste/ de ni go cha ngan ngon tsam gyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so//
222b1(mdo sde): lhas smras pa// skyes bu dam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par dka' ba yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang ci nas bdag gis brtsal ba don yod par 'gyur bar bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o//
222b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha khyod kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ smras pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa las rab tu grol bya ba dang / sems can tham
222b3(mdo sde): cad kyi phung po'i khur khyer ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad rtogs par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bsgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu des smras pa/ lha sems
222b4(mdo sde): can du 'du shes pa la ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa med do/ / nyon mongs par 'du shes pa la ni sems can thams cad rab tu grel par byed pa med do// phung por 'du shes pa la ni
222b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi phung po'i khur khyer ba med do/ / kun brtags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba can la ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa med do// bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa la ni sdug bsngal
222b6(mdo sde): thams cad rtogs par byed pa med do/ / de nas lha de dag gdams ngag 'di bstan pas 'thun pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo// de nas lha des rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ sgo khang der lha'i
222b7(mdo sde): me tog sil mas gtor ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha de la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis khyod kyi bsam pa ma shes nas nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyi gtam byas te dga' ba bskyed pa
223a1(mdo sde): de khyod kyis kyang bzod pa gyis shig/ de nas lha des 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal gyis/ sems can su'i tshod kyang ma 'dzin cig
223a2(mdo sde): sems can su la yang rung ste/ bsam pa ma brtags par chos ma 'chad cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma thos pa ni bla'i/ byang chub 'dod pas nyan thos kyi theg pa thos pa de ni de lta ma
223a3(mdo sde): yin no/ / btsun pa rab 'byor yun ring du bkres pa ni bla'i/ kha zas dug dang 'dres pa zos pa ni de lta ma yin no// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du ma thos pa bla'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
223a4(mdo sde): pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ni de lta ma yin no// de nas rigs kyi bu des yang bud med kyi gzugs dang / kha dog snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bstan nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
223a5(mdo sde): so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis bsod snyoms ma phul gyi bar du re zhig gzhes shig/ de nas bud med de rang gi khyim du song ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas blangs nas phyir byung ste/ 'ongs nas tshe dang
223a6(mdo sde): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad smras so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms 'di bzhes la/ 'dod chags dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig/ 'dod chags dang bral bar yang ma mdzad cig
223a7(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig/ zhe sdang dang bral bar yang ma mdzad cig/ gti mug dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig/ gti mug dang bral bar yang ma mdzad cig/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas
223b1(mdo sde): par yang ma mdzad cig/ nyon mongs pa dang bral bar yang ma mdzad cig/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis sdug bsngal yongs su ma mkhyen/ kun 'byung ba ma spangs 'gog pa mngon
223b2(mdo sde): sum du ma bgyis/ lam ma bsgoms na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ma bsgoms/ yang dag pa'i spongs pa bzhi dang
223b3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lags bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bsgoms na/ de lta na bsod
223b4(mdo sde): snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis 'jig tshogs kyang ma dkrugs la/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam yang thob na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/
223b5(mdo sde): gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ma rig pa ma bshig par/ rig pas rnam par grol ba mngon sum du mdzad pa dang / 'du byed zad par ma mdzad par 'dus ma byas pa mngon sum du mdzad pa dang / rnam
223b6(mdo sde): par shes pa'i rgyu ba la ma brten par rnam par grol bar gyur pa dang / ming dang gzugs sgro ma btags par khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa dang / skye mched drug la ma brten par rnam
223b7(mdo sde): bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid bsgoms pa dang / mig gis 'dus te reg pa la ma brten par rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa bsgoms pa dang / tshor ba ma dmigs par rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon
224a1(mdo sde): pa med pa mngon sum du mdzad pa dang / sred pa ma dmigs par de bzhin nyid yongs su mkhyen pa dang / len pa rlom sems su ma mdzad par len pa med pa kun mkhyen pa dang
224a2(mdo sde): srid pa mi 'byung ba'i tshul du yongs su mkhyen pa dang / skye ba mi skye bar yongs su mkhyen pa dang / rga shi brjod du med pa'i tshul du yongs su mkhyen pa de lta bur srid pa'i yan lag rnams kun mkhyen na
224a3(mdo sde): de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs chos kyang ma gsan/ dge 'dun la yang mi brten na/ de lta na
224a4(mdo sde): bsod snyoms 'di 'azhes shig/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis 'phags pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis so so'i skye bo mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di
224a5(mdo sde): bzhes shig/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor nyid 'di nas kyang med par gyur la/ pha rol tu yang mi skye na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor
224a6(mdo sde): gyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mnyam pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen la/ nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang / 'dod
224a7(mdo sde): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor sa sa'i skye bo'i sa las kyang ma 'das la
224b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i sa la yang ma zhugs na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor snang ba yang ma lags// snang bar 'gro ba yang ma lags 'khor ba la yang ma
224b2(mdo sde): zhugs/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi 'thob/ brdzun du smra ba yang ma lags bden par smra ba yang ma lags na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ gal te btsun pa rab
224b3(mdo sde): 'byor gyis zag pa yang zad par mi mdzad la/ mi zad pa yang 'khrug par mi mdzad/ phung po dang / khams dang // skye mched rnams las kyang mi g.yo la/ rten pa ma mchis par yang nyon
224b4(mdo sde): mongs pa ma mchis pa bsam gtan du mdzad/ thams cad la yang rtag tu smon pa mi mnga' la/ chos rnams kyang sems kyis shin tu thugs chung na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ btsun
224b5(mdo sde): ba rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis gang gi rab tu byung ba'i chos de ma rtogs na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags pa dang / sems can
224b6(mdo sde): dmyal ba pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal te nyon mongs pa med pa 'di gnyis la yon gnas ches lhag pa ma mchis na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig
224b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa rab 'byor la yon gnas yin par 'du shes skyed pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ btsun pa rab 'byor la med pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa 'debs pa ste/ gal te btsun pa rab
225a1(mdo sde): 'byor khyod chos de lta bu dang ldan na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sgo khang de g.yos par byas nas lag pa g.yas pa bcang te
225a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ / che zhe gang yang dag par smra ba na 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan par smra ba de dag ni/ bdag la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no// de skad ces smras nas bsod snyoms de blangs so//
225a3(mdo sde): de nas bud med des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces smras so// gang dag mnyam pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms len pa'i yon gnas de dag ni dkon no//
225a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams ni mnyam pa nyid 'di sun phyung ste/ smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha des/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
225a5(mdo sde): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis ci las bsams te/ gang dag chos 'di sun phyung ste/ smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/
225a6(mdo sde): zhes de skad smras smras pa/ lha 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mi chos 'ga' zhig la 'di ni rgyu dang bcas pa'o// 'di ni rgyu med pa'o zhes sun 'byin pa 'am/ smod par byed
225a7(mdo sde): dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ lha de bzhin du chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs na bdag gis sun dbyung ba 'am/ smad du ci zhig yod/ lha gzhan
225b1(mdo sde): yang bdag ni sems can thams cad kyis yang dag pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa brjod pa'i sgra de dag thams cad dang mnyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brjod pa thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ngo bo /
225b2(mdo sde): kyis brjod du med do// bsod snyoms len pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas bud med des 'phags
225b3(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor bshos gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bzhud cig dang / bdag kyang chos mnyan pa'i slad du
225b4(mdo sde): der mchi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bsod snyoms de blangs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas// de chos thos par dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas zas la sems
225b5(mdo sde): mi 'jug par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bsod snyoms blangs na/ gang la log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba su zhig la sbyin par bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
225b6(mdo sde): chos thams cad mi len pas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la man
225b7(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms 'di bdag la byin cig dang / bdag la byin na log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro//
226a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ci khyod tshul khrims blangs pa 'am/ tshul khrims la gnas pa yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang du med pa ste//
226a2(mdo sde): de la ni tshul khrims kyang med/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyang med do// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag ni srog gcod pa byed pa dang / ma byin par len pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa la log
226a3(mdo sde): par g.yem pa byed pa dang / brdzun du smra ba byed pa dang / phra ma byed pa dang / tshig rtsub po smra ba dang / tshig bkyal ba smra ba dang / brnab sems can dang / gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang /
226a4(mdo sde): log par lta ba can yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i bstan pa 'di 'dra ba las na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin par the tsom
226a5(mdo sde): med kyis ldem po ngag 'di bdag gis dri bar bya'o snyam mo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ci las bsams te/
226a6(mdo sde): 'di skad du bdag ni srog gcod par byed pa dang / ma byin par len pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed pa dang / rdzun du smra ba byed pa dang / phra ma byed pa dang / tshig tsub po smra ba dang /
226a7(mdo sde): tshig bkyal pa smra ba dang / brnab sems can dang / gnod sems kyis sems dang ldan pa dang / log par lta ba can yin no zhes smras/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mi len pas/
226b1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ byang chub lam ni bla med pa'i// lam ni bdag gis rnam par sbyangs// srog chags bye ba phrag stong yang // lam de la ni yongs su bkod//
226b2(mdo sde): srog ni bdag gis shin tu gtugs// de phyir bdag ni de skad smra// gang dag lam ni rnam par sbyangs// de dag srog gcod pa zhes bya// lhas ni byang chub byin ma yin// brgya byin tshangs pas ma byin te//
226b3(mdo sde): ma byin par ni bdag gis blangs// de phyir bdag ni ma byin len// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// 'thun pa'i theg pa blangs pas na// de phyir theg pa chen po 'di// ma byin blangs shes
226b4(mdo sde): bya ba yin/ / 'dod pa log par yongs shes pa// chos 'dod yin zhes de dag shes// 'dod pa 'di dag 'dod ma yin// de phyir log shes spyod par byed// sgrar ni ji snyed gdag pa rnams//
226b5(mdo sde): de dag brdzun zhes yang dag gsungs// med pa'i phyir ni de brdzun te// brdzun du smra ba zhes kyang bya// theg pa dman pa 'dod pa yi// sems can gang dag su yang rung // sems can de dag dbye/
226b6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir// theg pa che la 'god par byed// phra ma'i chog ni smra byed cing // mu stegs can gzhan 'byed par byed// sems can lam ngan ltung ba rnams// yang dag lam la 'dzud par byed/
226b7(mdo sde): rgol ba de dag tshar gcod de// de dag shin tu dga' ba byed// rtsub pa'i tshig ni smras nas kyang // bdud rnams thams cad pham par byas// rtsub pa'i tshig ni smra mod kyi// 'on kyang sems la khro//
227a1(mdo sde): ba med/ sems can smin par bya ba la// dpa' bo rnams kyi thabs la ltos// gang las dgongs te gsungs pa yis// dgongs pa'i tshig ni rab tu shes//
227a2(mdo sde): des na bsams te rab smra zhing // sems can bye ba 'dul bar byed// kha cig la ni bsams te smras// kha cig de dag brdzun par shes// de phyir bsams te smra ba yin// chos kyi mngon sum
227a3(mdo sde): rtogs par byed/ / sems can ji snyed yod pa rnams// re re la yang de dag ni// mi min lha yi bde ba dag/ 'jig rten na ni brnab sems byed// bde ba gang dag ldan gyur na// 'jig rten mgo// /
227a4(mdo sde): po phan byed 'gyur// bde ba de ni sems can kun// ldan par mkhas rnams brnab sems byed// sems can thams cad rgyal gyur ces// rtag tu de dag brnab sems byed// brnab sems de 'dra yin pas/
227a5(mdo sde): na// de phyir brnab sems can zhes smras// dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe// stobs chen rnams kyis tshar bcad de// de dag rang gi bde ba spong // chos dang srog chags spong mi byed// 'jig rten kun
227a6(mdo sde): gyi rgol ba dang / / sems can kun dang mi mthun te// thams cad 'thun par bya ba'i phyir// de dag gnod sems ston par byed// de dag bskal par rtsod byed dam// bskal pa bye bar rtsod kyang rung //
227a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos ni spong mi byed// slar yang ldog par yong mi byed// log par lta la dpa' ba rnams// de dag 'dus byas kun la snyoms// log par lta ba rab tu shes// yang dag lta ba'i rnam pa
227b1(mdo sde): rtogs/ / gang dag de 'dra'i chos dang ldan// de dang de dag khrims la gnas// gnas med la ni gnas bcas nas// mkhas rnams byang chub rtogs par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
227b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la bsod snyoms de byin nas 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag gis ni dad pas byin pa'i bsod snyoms log par ltung bar mi byed do zhes smras so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
227b3(mdo sde): zan ma zos te/ phye ma red kyi dus na/ nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
227b4(mdo sde): ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de su yin pa shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom
227b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ma 'tshal lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bud med 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/ dga' ba bkod pa'i
227b6(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ / rab 'byor dper na yungs 'brus shing rta brkang pa la yul ma ga d+ha'i khal bcu tshad nyi shu yod pa las// lo brgya zhing yungs 'bru re re
227b7(mdo sde): bor ba ni/ bgrang ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis shing rta de'i yungs 'bru'i mtha' ches myur du rtags par nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas mi mjed kyi
228a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten khams 'dir/ sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa dang / sems can mang po lha dang mir skye ba la bkod pa rnams ni
228a2(mdo sde): de lta ma yin no/ / de nas bud med de bud med lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
228a3(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med de 'ong ba thag ring po nas gzigs te/ gzigs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bud med lnga brgya
228a4(mdo sde): tsam 'ong ba 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur
228a5(mdo sde): bas/ dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su smin par byas nas/ bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa sha stag go// de nas bud med de bud med lnga brgyas bskor
228a6(mdo sde): cing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med
228a7(mdo sde): dri bsu nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'phags pa'i chos ma thob pa dang /
228b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lus su mi gnas pa'i bud med la ci'i phyir phyag 'tshal/ bud med la ci'i phyir phyag 'tshal/ bud med des smras pa/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu gal te 'jig rten na 'phags pa
228b2(mdo sde): ni gang dag lags/ 'phags pa ma lags pa ni gang dag lags pa mkhyen na khyod kyis spobs par mdzod cig/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/ che zhe khyod kyis 'jig rten na 'phags pa gang
228b3(mdo sde): dag yin pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa gang dag yin pa shes sam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gis 'tshal te/ smras pa de dag gang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA/
228b4(mdo sde): ri'i bu 'phags pa'i rigs mi gcod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o//
228b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams la thar par 'dod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o// btsun pa gA ri'i bu gzhan yang bud med
228b6(mdo sde): / rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ gos gtsang ma srab mo gyon pa/ phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa rnams la brten pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa/ thams cad
228b7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba ni ches bla'i/ dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dben pa na gnas pa ni de lta ma lags so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang don 'di nyid brda
229a1(mdo sde): spang ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bgyin/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du dgongs 'ching bu'i nor bu bai DUR+Ya'i snod du bcug pa gdam mam/ 'on te nor bu rin
229a2(mdo sde): po che rin thang med pa 'dam rdzab tu bcug pa gdam/ gnas brtan shwa ri'i bus smras pa/ che zhe nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa 'dam rdzab tu bcug pa gdam gyi/ mching bu'i nor bu bai DUR+Ya'i snod du/
229a3(mdo sde): bcug pa ni de lta ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba ni ches 'phags kyi/ dgra bcom pa
229a4(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ dben pa na gnas pa de ni de lta ma lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ci che zhe khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/
229a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po ni gang la yang mi gnas la/ ldog pa yang ma mchis so// smras pa/ cha zhe gal te theg pa chen po gang la'ang mi gnas la/ ldog pa yang med pa
229a6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci la zhugs/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po pa rnams ni ci la yang mi gnas te/ ma rig pa zad par bgyi ba'i slad
229a7(mdo sde): du de dag mi gnas pa nas/ rga shi'i bar du zad par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag mi gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu ma rig pa nas/ rga shi'i bar du mi zad pa'i
229b1(mdo sde): slad du'o/ / des na de dag ni skye ba'i chos can yang ma lags/ 'gag pa'i chos can yang ma lags so// gal te skye bar gyur na ni de las zad par 'gyur na/ gang gi phyir mi skye ba de'i phyir mi zad do//
229b2(mdo sde): de bas na zad pa yang ma mchis/ skye ba yang ma mchis so// dge sbyong gi chos ni mi skye ba'i chos can no// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa lags/
229b3(mdo sde): so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe khyod ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pas phyag bya ba'i 'os
229b4(mdo sde): yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zag gis gang zag la tshod
229b5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa su zhig mchis te/ che zhe 'di ni 'di ltar rgyan gyis legs par brgyan la/ 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan lags so// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa /
229b6(mdo sde): ri'i bu 'di ni rgyan gyi spobs pa ma lags so// smras pa/ 'o na gang gi spobs pa yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan lags
229b7(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang nya/ snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i mam pas gnas pa'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems
230a1(mdo sde): kyi rgyan dang / thos pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la chog mi shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa rnams la tshul bzhin du
230a2(mdo sde): so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang
230a3(mdo sde): sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan dang / rgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan te/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu brgyad po de dag ni
230a4(mdo sde): rgyan dag lags te/ rgyan de dag gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
230a5(mdo sde): to/ / bcom ldan 'das che zhes 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes lags/ de nas bud med des bdag nyid kyi lus ci 'dra ba de kho na 'dra ba'i bud med dag cig tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du sprul
230a6(mdo sde): to/ / sprul nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis bud med 'di lag las shi 'phos te 'di skyes zhes dris shig/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa
230a7(mdo sde): bud med 'di ni sprul pa yin te/ sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med do// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ro'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par rdzogs
230b1(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas so/ / chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de dag la ni 'chi 'pho 'am/ skye ba dri bar mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
230b2(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba zhes bya ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing mngon par dga' ba nas shi
230b3(mdo sde): 'phos nas/ sems can yongasasu smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba 'dis/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can dpag tu med
230b4(mdo sde): pa grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas/ bud med kyi gzugs nyid kyis bcom
230b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan pa'i bar dang / bdag gi bud med kyi lus su ma
230b6(mdo sde): mchis par gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus su ma gyur kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs las mi ldang lags so// bud med lnga brgya po de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/
230b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bud med kyi rang bzhin las gyur te skyes pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur gyi bar dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan gyi
231a1(mdo sde): bar du bdag cag mi ldang lags so/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de
231a2(mdo sde): de nas de'i mod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na ci sgo nas 'od zer du ma sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang
231a3(mdo sde): shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyis khams mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug ste phyir log
231a4(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde
231a5(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na//
231a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpar bud med 'gyur ba/
231a7(mdo sde): bud med lnga brgyas bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dag so byang chub
231b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba 'di bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du de bzhin
231b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ des byang chub thob pa na/ bud med lnga brgya po 'di dag gzungs thob pa
231b3(mdo sde): dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'dis/ yon tan gyi rgyan bstan pa gang dag yin pa'i rgyan brgyad po de dag
231b4(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
231b5(mdo sde): lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'byor cing rgyas la/ bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang /
231b6(mdo sde): mi dang skye bo mang pos gang bar gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ bud med kyi ming tsam yang med par 'gyur te/ sems can de
231b7(mdo sde): thams cad pad+ma'i snying po la rdzus te skyes nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bung
232a1(mdo sde): med 'gyur ba de dang / bud med lnga brgya po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de kho nas ta la bdun srid tsam
232a2(mdo sde): gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ de'i mod kho na la khye'u lo bcu drug lon pa tsam du snang bar gyur to// de dag par snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas// de bzhin
232a3(mdo sde): gshegs pas de dag thams cad kyi spyi bor phyag gis byugs so/ / de nas de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe/ gzungs dang kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
232a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung la gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/
232a5(mdo sde): ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis spobs pa bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya bar zung zhig/ bud
232a6(mdo sde): med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'khor dang bcas pa dang // tshe dang
232a7(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
232b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// @rgya gar swa
232b2(mdo sde): du.Ar+ya sing ha na di ka na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
232b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das nyi zla'i gnas rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang bzangs kyi nang na dge slong gi dge 'dun po dgra bcom pa bye ba khrag khrig
232b4(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po la bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rgyal ba'i
232b5(mdo sde): phung po khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs na/ gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes
232b6(mdo sde): bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos 'phags zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te// 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//
232b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po 'jig
233a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams der song nas bcom ldan 'das chos 'phags de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// byang
233a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags des byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad
233a3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la cang
233a4(mdo sde): mi smra bar kha rog 'dug go/ / de'i tshe der 'khor 'dus pa gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
233a5(mdo sde): mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po 'di 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mas bka' stsal pa la lan mi gsol bar kha rog
233a6(mdo sde): 'dug cig gu snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi der seng ge bsgyings pa lta bus phyogs bcur gzigs na/ 'khor thams cad the tsom du gyur par thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//
233a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags de 'dzum pa 'dzad pa'i 'od kyi snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bcur snang bar mdzad do// de nas skad cig de nyid la sa
233b1(mdo sde): chen po g.yos par gyur to/ / phyogs bcu nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dang / kha dog dang / tshul du ma 'chang ba dag bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po de mthong nas 'jig rten
233b2(mdo sde): gyi khams der thams cad 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rang rang gi dge bas bsgrubs pas 'dug ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
233b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / rmad du gyur pas 'dzum dmyal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
233b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'od zer gyi cho 'phrul du ma dag mthong lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di lta bu dag sngon nam yang ma mthong lags so// bcom ldan
233b5(mdo sde): 'das 'di'i don de ni legs pa lags te/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa de lta bu mdzad pa'i don de bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te lung bstan du gsol/ de nas byang chub
233b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od 'phreng gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad de gsol pa/ rnam 'dren gang zag mchog ste thugs rje can// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// bdag
233b7(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten snang mdzad thugs rje can/ / 'dzum mdzad rgyu dang mdzad rgyas par gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar snang zhing
234a1(mdo sde): 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rab tu 'gyed pa/ sku'i gzugs dang mdog gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od 'phreng gis 'di skad
234a2(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis cho 'phrul mang po mthong lags te/ bdag gis sngon 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di lta bu nams kyang ma mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs
234a3(mdo sde): pa des bka' stsal pa/ 'od 'phreng phyogs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di lta bu chung ngu zhig mdzad de/ mtshan ma snang ba de dag ni rgyu med pa ma yin// byed rgyu med pa
234a4(mdo sde): ma yin no/ / 'od 'phreng khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// don gang gi phyir ngas 'dzum pa mdzad pa thos nas kyang / rigs kyi bu khyod
234a5(mdo sde): kyis skrag par mi bya/ dngang bar mi bya/ dngang bar 'gyur bar mi bya/ som nyir mi bya/ the tshom du mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis
234a6(mdo sde): mi khyab bo/ / smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// don de dag yang dag par mthong nas/ the tshom ma byed cig/ 'od 'phreng gang 'di ltar
234a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ nga'i drung du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po btang ba 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//
234b1(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po 'di la/ ngas khyod ga las 'ongs zhes de skad dris nas/ de cang mi smra bar kha reg
234b2(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas 'dir 'dzum pa mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pas smras pa'i lan de ci'i phyir 'dis ma gsol snyam du 'khor 'di dag thams cad the
234b3(mdo sde): chom du gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu ngas smras pa'i lan skyes bu dam pa 'dis ci'i phyir ma gsol ce na/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i chos rnams la bcom ldan 'das bdag la khyod ga las 'ongs zhes 'ong
